data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Sumatera Selatan, Indonesia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sumatera Selatan, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Sumatera Selatan, Indonesia from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Sumatera Selatan against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Over 88.73 percent of the people of Sumatera Selatan are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Jesus, I pray that all the Kikim people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Kikim people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Kikim people is yours.
God, we pray for the believers in Sumatera Selatan, Indonesia to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Sumatera Selatan.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sumatera Selatan, Indonesia has a population of 7,743,800.

We estimate Sumatera Selatan has 248,453 people who might know Jesus, 624,191 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6,871,157 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 31 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 248,453 believers in Sumatera Selatan, Indonesia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.
